title: Hyakuyou Daichou
description:
On Kisouji of the Nakasendo Trail, there is a tea house for wary travelers to rest. One of their customer’s rather eccentric though. Instead of paying with mon, he pays with leaves. Maybe that’s why he catches the owner’s attention…?

Part of Canna’s volume 14 short project, Blushing Boys.

[b][u]Polish / Polski:[/u][/b]
[spoiler]Tajemniczy gość często odwiedza pewną herbaciarnię leżącą u podnóża gór.[/spoiler]
